SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
mapper.update: UPDATE orderlist SET custid=#{custid}, cnt=#{cnt}, totalprice=#{totalprice}, reservedate=#{reservedate}, reservetime=#{reservetime} WHERE orderlistno=#{orderlistno}
mapper.select: select o.orderlistno, o.orderdate, o.reservedate, o.reservetime, s.storename, o.totalprice from orderlist o inner join cust c on c.custid = o.custid inner join reserve r on r.orderlistno = o.orderlistno inner join menu m on m.menuid = r.menuid inner join store s on s.storeid = m.storeid where c.custid = #{custid} group by o.orderlistno, s.storename;

select o.reservedate, o.reservetime, s.storename, m.menuname, o.totalprice from orderlist o inner join cust c on c.custid = o.custid inner join reserve r on r.orderlistno = o.orderlistno inner join menu m on m.menuid = r.menuid inner join store s on s.storeid = m.storeid where c.custid = #{custid} order by o.reservedate desc limit 1;
